nodes.text: The flag of Hok was the flag used to symbolize the planet Hok, a colony world of the Gran species.
It had three yellow areas in the top and bottom right corners. The rest of the flag was green. A black symbol that looked similar to two C's back to back was in the green portion.
The Gran podracer Mawhonic flew the flag of Hok to represent his homeworld before the Boonta Eve Classic in Mos Espa on Tatooine in 32 BBY.
In addition to appearing in The Phantom Menace, this flag came with a Mawhonic action figure released by Hasbro in 2012.
